title: Cable Standing High Cross Triceps Extension

content.title: Cable Standing High Cross Triceps Extension Instructions

items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a cable with both hands.
Extend your arms straight up above your head, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Slowly lower the cable behind your head, bending your elbows and keeping your upper arms stationary.
Pause for a moment, then use your triceps to extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

content.title: Cable Standing High Cross Triceps Extension Form & Visual
Cable Standing High Cross Triceps Extension Benefits

items: Targets the triceps muscles, helping to tone and strengthen them
Improves overall arm strength and definition
Engages the core muscles for added stability and balance
Can be easily modified to increase or decrease resistance
Requires minimal equipment and can be done at home or in the gym

content.title: Cable Standing High Cross Triceps Extension Muscles Worked

items: Triceps brachii
Anconeus
